item.title: Community Map (WIP)
item.description: The Austrian Digitisation Agency commissioned a stakeholder mapping of actors pushing digitisation forward in Austria. The Community Map, a Shiny app, shows data collected from a snowballing survey in which key actors identified their main partners and provided information about their R&D, business and data sharing links.

item.title: Custom Markers in Leaflet
item.description: It is impossible to customise the colour of markers in leaflet for R. It is possible with MapMaker.io which provides icons under a Creative Commons Library. library(leaflet) ## Warning: package 'leaflet' was built under R version 3.5.3 df <- data.frame( lng = c(0, 22), lat = c(33, 44) ) custom_icon <- makeIcon( iconUrl = "https://cdn.mapmarker.io/api/v1/pin?size=120&background=%23009CE0&icon=fa-flag&color=%23FFFFFF&voffset=0&hoffset=1&", iconWidth = 40, iconHeight = 40, iconAnchorX = 20, iconAnchorY = 40, shadowUrl = "www/marker/shadow.
